workflows.title: On Draft NS Renewal Subscription Created/Updated, Create/Update SF Renewal Opportunity
workflows.description: Creates Salesforce renewal opportunity for NetSuite renewal subscription

forceUpdate.title: Force update
forceUpdate.description: Skip checks and update the opportunity

row.title: row
row.description: Log row number. This value is used to update import information.

message.value: Renewal opportunity updated from NetSuite. Subscription Name: {$.steps.netsuite-2.name}

script-6.title: Get parent sub SuiteQL
script-6.description: Form a SuiteQL to select the parent subscription since it is missing from the REST response

script-13.title: Get Updated Record Fields
script-13.description: Compares the properties of two objects (AS-IS and TO-BE) and returns an array of key-value pairs containing only the updated properties. If there are no differences, the returned array will be empty.

salesforce-11.title: Get Distributor Account
salesforce-11.description: Select the distributor account id corresponding to the NetSuite id

object-helpers-2.title: Create Opp Record (2)
object-helpers-2.description: Common Opportunity record (2) before checking the creation or the update of an existing opportunity.

boolean-condition-15.title: Updating existing opp?
boolean-condition-15.description: If the opportunity exists we need to delete the existing partners and recreated them if needed.

boolean-condition-5.title: Is support level product?
boolean-condition-5.description: Since the main product is not present for the Maintenance only plans, we rely on the support level item.

script-3.title: Get product codes
script-3.description: Get the Main and Support product codes

boolean-condition-30.title: Opp Is Pending and Not Legacy

salesforce-7.title: Get reseller
salesforce-7.description: Select the reseller account id corresponding to the NetSuite id

value.value: Will be rewritten at the next step

salesforce-12.title: Insert distributor
salesforce-12.description: Insert the Partner record for the reseller

storage-3.title: Save main products prices
storage-3.description: Saves the main product prices in a list

boolean-condition-4.title: Not add-On?
boolean-condition-4.description: Process main products and add-ons separately

storage-4.title: Get main product prices
storage-4.description: Get all the saved product prices (1 or 2 items).

message.value: Main product was not found in Salesforce (NetSuite ID={$.steps.netsuite-2.subscriptionPlan.id}). Only a shell opportunity is created.

script-4.title: Get Updated Record Fields
script-4.description: Compares the properties of two objects (AS-IS and TO-BE) and returns an array of key-value pairs containing only the updated properties. If there are no differences, the returned array will be empty.

boolean-condition-8.title: Has Distributor?
boolean-condition-8.description: True if the subscription uses a distributor

boolean-condition-7.title: Has reseller?
boolean-condition-7.description: True if the subscription uses a reseller

math-helpers-1.title: Main product price
math-helpers-1.description: Sum the main product price and the support line price to get the total price

value.value: Not a DRAFT or not a renewal (no parent)

boolean-condition-13.title: Force change?
boolean-condition-13.description: Skip checks and update the opportunity

salesforce-10.title: Insert reseller
salesforce-10.description: Insert the Partner record for the reseller

netsuite-1.title: Get currency code
netsuite-1.description: Get Currency code for the SF records

boolean-condition-14.title: Updating existing opp?
boolean-condition-14.description: If the opportunity exists we need to delete the exsiting lines and recreated them if needed.

salesforce-15.title: Delete existing lines
salesforce-15.description: For some reason the bulk update doesn't work, so deleting lines one by one.

object-helpers-1.title: Create Opp Record (1)
object-helpers-1.description: Common Opportunity record (1) created before checking the existence of the opportunity.

script-2.title: Get currency SuiteQL
script-2.description: Formats a query text to select the currency code

boolean-condition-3.title: Main or support product
boolean-condition-3.description: Sums the main and support products prices

boolean-condition-10.title: Enabled for the product?
boolean-condition-10.description: Filter out subscriptinos by their class

message.value: Not a DRAFT or not a renewal (no parent)

dependencies.name: Check if Sync is Enabled for the Object
